resources.string: "You have no projects. Press the \"+\" button to add one."
"This machine will be removed from the cart."
"This project will not be available anymore."
"Thank you. Your request has been sent."
"This combination of username and password is unknown to us"
"The change request will be processed as soon as possible."
"Off rent request failed. Please try again later."
"Off rent requested. We will process it as soon as possible."
"Change request failed. Please try again later."
"Changes requested. We will process them as soon as possible."
"You cannot order machines from different countries. Your cart will be emptied."
"A new version of the app is available."
"You need to update the app before you can continue!"
"Something went wrong while sending your feedback. Please try again later."
"* You can always change this setting later"

"A scissor lift is a type of aerial work platform that can only extend vertically. The electric- or diesel-powered platform that is mounted on folding arms is used to provide elevated work areas or to help raise or lower unit loads."
"A vertical lift is a type of aerial work platform that can only extend vertically. Vertical lifts are the best solution when you need to do maintenance or repair work at heights in tight spaces."

"A crawler lift is a telescopic boom or scissor lift with special crawler tracks. These crawler tracks ensure great maneuverability on rough terrain and make the crawler boom/scissor lifts suitable for a variety of jobs on challenging surfaces."

"A spider lift is a very compact boom lift. Whether you’re working indoors or outside, spider lifts have your job covered. With enhanced maneuverability and better access, you have the ability to reach more places thanks to its low profile, non-marking tracks and compact dimensions."

"Telescopic boom lifts are aerial work platform with greater horizontal outreach than any other type of aerial work platforms. Boom lifts extend telescopically and are ideal when you are facing tall challenges (up to 58 meters)."

"A trailer mounted lift is a type of platform that can be towed by a vehicle, ideal for those who are on the move. The electric powered trailer mounted lifts are perfectly suitable for both working inside and outside."
"A truck mounted lift is a type of aerial work platform. The boom lift is mounted on a vehicle. Therefore the truck mounted boom lift is a great choice for those who are always on the move."

"A telehandler is a powerful machine that lifts heavy materials. The telescopic boom can extend several meters forward and upwards. Accessories like buckets, truss booms, carriages, pallet forks and smart platforms are available to extend the versatility and performance of the telehandler."

"A rotating telehandler is a powerful machine that lifts heavy materials. Thanks to the rotating boom, the rotating telehandlers can be used in difficult to reach places. Accessories like buckets, truss booms, carriages, pallet forks and smart platforms are available to extend the versatility and performance of the telehandler."

"Mini cranes are cranes built for relatively light lifting. When lifting requirements are in a location with tight access, restricted space or obstructions, a mini crane will be perfect for the job. Mini cranes are designed to go places where conventional or large cranes cannot go."

"A SmartLift is designed to safely and easily place glass panels. These revolutionary new glass handling machines lift and position both straight and curved panes with precision, allowing you to place your glass exactly where you need it."
"Order is only valid after receiving order confirmation."
"Do you have an exact end date?"
"The earliest delivery day is %s. Need it sooner? Please give us a call."
"Choosing today as stop date was possible before %s via the app. Please call us if you need to stop renting today."
"Any additional remarks for the Rental Desk?"
"How satisfied are you with the Riwal Rental app?"
"How satisfied are you with the Manlift Rental app?"
"How can we improve the Riwal Rental app?"
"How can we improve the Manlift Rental app?"
"Articulating boom lifts have multiple boom sections that articulate allowing you to gain access to hard-to-reach areas. Riwal articulating booms give you up, out, and over positioning capability."
"Articulating boom lifts have multiple boom sections that articulate allowing you to gain access to hard-to-reach areas. Manlift articulating booms give you up, out, and over positioning capability."
"A forklift is a diesel powered truck that is used to lift and move materials. Riwal offers different types of forklifts from renowned brands such as Jungheinrich."
"A forklift is a diesel powered truck that is used to lift and move materials. Manlift offers different types of forklifts from renowned brands such as Jungheinrich."
"It is not possible to rent %s via the app at this time."
"We use this to show your location on the map"
"The rental period will end on %s. The machine will then be picked up by us as soon as possible. You can change this later in My Rentals on your account page, or by contacting us."
"You have the option to keep using the machine after %s. The rental period will continue until you request to stop renting in My Rentals on your account page, or when you contact us."
"The rental period will end on %s. The machine will then be picked up by us as soon as possible. You can change this later by contacting us."
"You have the option to keep using the machine after %s. The rental period will continue until you contact us to stop renting."
"The rental period will end on %s. The machines will then be picked up by us as soon as possible."
"The rental period will end on %s. The machine will then be picked up by us as soon as possible."
"Unfortunately there are no machines available in your country that we could immediately recommend, based on your criteria. Our rental desk may be able to find an alternative."
"The rental period for machine %s will end in %s day(s)."
"Touch the screen to place the machine"
"No internet connection. Please connect to the internet and try again"
"The connection timed out. Please try again."
"Something went wrong. Please try again later, or contact the service desk if this issue keeps occurring."
"The server is down, please try again later."
"Make sure the lighting conditions are optimal."
"Make sure the floor and/or wall is non-reflective. AR doesn't work very well on e.g. shiny floors or glass walls."
"Place the machine in an area where it would physically fit. This prevents optical illusions like that the machine appears to be \"floating\" when it overlaps with real world objects."
"Move the camera at a slow to medium pace."
"AR is only supported on iPhone 6s and newer devices running on iOS 11.3 or later"
"Hold the left or right button to rotate the machine"
"Tip: Measure whether the machine fits your project"
"Please fill in the information below. You'll receive a confirmation mail when you've send the form."

"Want to see your current rentals? Easily off rent machines or make some changes to current rentals?
Log in or request an account to start."
"Account requested. We will process it as soon as possible."
"Account request failed. Please try again later."
"Are you sure you want to logout?"
"Delivery on the weekend is not possible via the app. Please contact the Rental Desk by phone. We are sorry for the inconvenience."
"Breakdown reported. We will process it as soon as possible."
"Breakdown report failed. Please try again later."
"Our Technical Desk will contact you as soon as possible with a solution"
"This app uses the camera for QR code scanning and Augmented Reality."
"Scan the QR code on the machine"
"Could not find rental order for this machine"
"Enable camera access in Settings to use this functionality."
"The use of the camera is restricted. Please contact your device administrator."
"Cannot use the camera for an unknown reason. The app's development team has been notified."
"We will send an email with your new password once you submit the request."
"Your password has been successfully reset. Please check your email for the new password"
"You have entered an incorrect email address, please enter the registered email address."
"I have read and accept the privacy policy"
"Currently there are no customers for this user, Please add customers to login"
"Cancel rent request failed. Please try again later."
"Cancel rent requested. We will process it as soon as possible."
"Please choose a time before %s, or call us if you need to stop renting at this time."
"Please choose a time before %s, or call us if you need to start renting at this time."
"Are you sure you want to upload the images?"
"You requested to transfer the %s to %s. %s will receive a notification to accept the transfer. Once accepted and processed in our system the status will change to machine transferred."
"Reject transfer request failed. Please try again later."
"Transfer request rejected. We will process it as soon as possible."
"Transfer request failed. Please try again later."
"Are you sure you want to reject transfer machine?"

"You requested to transfer the %s to %s %s. They will receive a notification to accept the transferred machine(s). Once accepted and processed in our system, you will receive an email confirming the transfer."
"%s from %s has requested the %s. Before we transfer the machine we would like to confirm that there is no damage. We, therefore, ask you to take pictures of all sides of the machine."

"The transfer of %s from %s at %s has requested. Our rental desk will process the request as soon as possible. To guarantee safety, a First Check will be carried out on the machine before you can use it until then we cannot use the machine."
"%s has declined your request to transfer %s."

"The transfer of %s from %s at %s has accepted. Our rental desk will process the request as soon as possible. To guarantee safety, a First Check will be carried out on the machine before you can use it."
"Accept transfer requested, We will process it as soon as possible"
"Accept transfer failed. Please try again later."
"Camera permission needed to use QR scanner"
"Please add images for the machines that is going to be transferred."
"The training quotes requested will be processed as soon as possible."
"Training quote requested. We will contact you as soon as possible"
"%s invoices are overdue, Overdue amount is %s"
"Did you know that you can book training through the app? Click OK to view a short tutorial."
"Did you know that you can book training through the app?"
"Select the category of training that you are interested in."
"Click the 'details' button to select a specific training course."
"Select the 'request a quote' button to request the training."
"Fill out the details of your request."
"Tap on the 'send' button to request the training. One of our staff members will contact you shortly."
"The file you have requested is not available"
"Is the machine available to be picked up by our driver?"
We have replaced this app with the new My Riwal app and you need to install the new app before you can continue!. Once installed you may delete the old version.
We have replaced this app with the new My Manlift app and you need to install the new app before you can continue!. Once installed you may delete the old version.
